text.data: Matelite: What's with this fancy door?[end][character][0x1]
[character][0x1]: Oh![end]S
Sendak: Are you all right, Princess?[end][character][0x1]
[character][0x1]: There is... a Holy Dragon... Ahead, on the other side of the door...[end]M
Matelite: Okay! Now it's our turn! Let's go, Taicho![end]T
Taicho: Affirmative![end]T
Taicho: It is too hard! We cannot even scratch it![end]M
Matelite: Hmmm... If this gets out, the title of Royal Guard will become obsolete.[end]S

Sendak: It is no use with brute strength alone...
If indeed this is a doorway to a Holy Dragon, there is no way we can pry our way inside![end]O

Only the one with the power of a Dragnar can open it...
Okay, Princess...[end][character][0x1]
[character][0x1]: Okay. Let me try.[end]M
Matelite: What? What's going on?![end][0x0]
Matelite: Oh! It wouldn't even budge when we tried, but now it's...[end]T
Taicho: Is there truly a Holy Dragon inside?[end][character][0x1]
[character][0x1]: The Holy Dragon is... calling me...[end]S
Sendak: Ahead is the Holy Dragon's sanctum... I am not sure we can enter...[end]M
Matelite: We can't put [character][0x1] in danger! [character][0x1]!! You go ahead and check it out![end][character][0x1]
[character][0x1]: Aah![end]S
Sendak: Princess![end]T
T-this is...[end]M
Matelite: Unngh... What is this?! Even if it costs me my life, I shall protect [character][0x1]![end][character][0x1]
[character][0x1]!![end]L
Leviathan: Girl... The one who heals our wounds...[end][character][0x1]
[character][0x1]: M-me? Heal your wounds?[end]L

Leviathan: Our sadness... Our anger...
Come... Listen closely to our call...[end][character][0x1]
[character][0x1]: Please, wait![end]S
Sendak: Princess! Say something![end][character][0x1]
[character][0x1]: [character][0x1]...[end][character][0x1]

[character][0x1]: Leviathan...
Anger...? Sadness...?[end]T
The Holy Dragons... They seem to be angry... And sad...[end]S
Sendak: Anger...? Sadness...? Just what does it mean...? I do not understand... I am sad...[end]M
Matelite: Well how about that?! The Holy Dragons are just like us![end]O

Our hearts are always full of anger and sadness!!
When I think about the day Kahna was destroyed... I...[end]E
Everybody in the Resistance must have wounds in their hearts... Secret thoughts they can tell no one... Wounds in their hearts...[end]O
Our thoughts are with the Holy Dragons! We fight together![end]M
Matelite: Let's hurry and get out of here![end][character][0x1]
[character][0x1]: The Holy Dragon is... very powerful...[end]S
Sendak: [character][0x1], are you all right? I have a bad feeling about this...[end]M
Matelite: Take care of it, [character][0x1]![end]T
Taicho: [character][0x1], ho![end][end]
